meanings.definition: Self-confidence or assurance, especially in a demanding situation.
meanings.sent1: She faced the challenge with aplombs, showing great self-confidence.
meanings.sent2: His aplombs in public speaking impressed everyone in the audience.
meanings.sent3: With her aplombs, she convinced the team to take on the difficult project.
meanings.sent4: His aplombs shone like a beacon of confidence in the room.
meanings.sent5: The leader's aplombs inspired the team to overcome any obstacle.

meanings.definition: The perpendicular position of a plumb line.
meanings.sent1: The builder ensured the wall's aplombs using a plumb line.
meanings.sent2: The aplombs of the structure were crucial for its stability.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the aplombs of the hanging plumb line.
meanings.sent4: The aplombs of the tower were a symbol of precision and accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The aplombs of the plumb line guided the construction to perfection.
